bio:
Military Service

Service Number: J/26853

Age: 20

Force: Air Force

Unit: Royal Canadian Air Force

Division: 148 (R.A.F.) Sqdn.


Citations:

1939-45 Star, Italy Star, Defence Medal, War Medal 1939-45, Canadian Volunteer Service Medal and Clasp, Posthumously awarded RCAF Operational Wings in recognition of gallant service in action against the enemy


Flying Officer / Wireless Operator - Air Gunner.


He enlisted in Toronto, Ontario on May 20, 1942.


Harold died when his Halifax JP.276 crashed at Morzychna, Poland.


He is remembered on a marker here at Crediton Cemetery but he is buried at Rackowicki Cemetery in Poland. Family links are attached to the burial memorial.
title: Veteran
